item.name: Data troca bateria
item.description: The date that batteries were last replaced.

item.name: Versao firmware
item.description: The firmware revision number as reported by the UPS.

item.name: Ultima entrada na bateria
item.description: The reason for the last transfer to batteries.

item.name: Modelo
item.description: The old APC model identification code.

item.name: Trocas para bateria
item.description: The number of transfers to batteries since apcupsd startup.

item.name: Auto teste
item.description:
The results of the last self test, and may have the following values:
OK: self test indicates good battery BT: self test failed due to insufficient battery capacity NG: self test failed due to overload NO: No results (i.e. no self test performed in the last 5 minutes)

item.name: Sensibilidade voltagem
item.description: The sensitivity level of the UPS to line voltage fluctuations.

item.name: Numero serial
item.description: The UPS serial number.

item.name: Status
item.description: The current status of the UPS (ONLINE, ONBATT, etc.)

item.name: Modo apcupsd
item.description: The mode in which apcupsd is operating as specified in the configuration file (UPSMODE)

item.name: Uptime ultima entrada na bateria
item.description: Time and date of last transfer from batteries, or N/A.

item.name: Voltagem bateria
item.description: Battery voltage as supplied by the UPS.

item.name: Nivel bateria
item.description: The percentage charge on the batteries.

item.name: Tempo acumulado bateria
item.description: Total (cumulative) time on batteries in seconds since apcupsd startup.

item.name: Alta tensao
item.description: High line voltage causing transfer to battery power or activation of SmartTrim. Allowable values depend on the last letter of the firmware or APCMODEL.

item.name: Voltagem rede eletrica
item.description: This is the line voltage and it should be a value that is appropriate for your equipment. In the USA, it is typically about 120 Volts while in Europe, it is about 220 Volts.

item.name: Carga estimada
item.description: The percentage of load capacity as estimated by the UPS.

item.name: Baixa tensao
item.description: Low line voltage causing transfer to battery power or activation of SmartBoost. Allowable values depend on the last letter of the firmware or APCMODEL.

item.name: Tempo maximo bateria para desligamento
item.description: pcupsd will shutdown your system if the time on batteries exceeds this value. A value of zero disables the feature.

item.name: Nivel bateria para desligamento
item.description: If the battery charge percentage (BCHARGE) drops below this value, apcupsd will shutdown your system.

item.name: Tempo restante bateria para desligamento
item.description: apcupsd will shutdown your system if the remaining runtime equals or is below this point.

item.name: Tensao nominal bateria
item.description: The nominal battery voltage.

item.name: Tensao de entrada
item.description: The input voltage that the UPS is configured to expect.

item.name: Potencia maxima
item.description: The maximum power in Watts that the UPS is designed to supply.

item.name: Tempo restante bateria
item.description: The remaining runtime left on batteries as estimated by the UPS.

item.name: Tempo corrente bateria
item.description: Time in seconds currently on batteries, or 0.

item.name: Potencia disponivel
item.description: Potencia disponivel: (100 - es600.sh[num,LOADPCT]) * (es600.sh[num,NOMPOWER] / 100) (100 - 8) * (865 / 100) = watts.disponivel
